Title: Requires the department of health to support tobacco and vapor product use prevention and control activities including marketing and advertising to discourage tobacco and vapor product use
Summary: Requires the department of health to support tobacco and vapor product use prevention and control activities including marketing and advertising to discourage tobacco and vapor product use among consumers historically targeted by tobacco and vapor product advertising and manufacturers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to targeted and updated education and outreach related to tobacco and vapor products
